entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:35 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
